scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:components && npm run build:blocks
scripts.build:blocks: rm -rf ./blocks && mkdir -p ./blocks && cd ../blocks && for dir in */; do mkdir -p ../core/blocks/$dir && cp -r $dir/build ../core/blocks/$dir/ && cp -r $dir/src ../core/blocks/$dir/; done
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && git add packages/core/package.json && git commit -m "Bump version to $(node -p 'require("./packages/core/package.json").version')" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require("./packages/core/package.json").version')" && git push origin main && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && git add packages/core/package.json && git commit -m "Bump version to $(node -p 'require("./packages/core/package.json").version')" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require("./packages/core/package.json").version')" && git push origin main && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && git add packages/core/package.json && git commit -m "Bump version to $(node -p 'require("./packages/core/package.json").version')" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require("./packages/core/package.json").version')" && git push origin main && git push --tags
